Detailed Description

Date:
08-20-2001
Author:
Eric Crahen
Version:
1.0

Add figure editing support to a Diagram. The method used to supprot figure editing is a simplified version of the method used in Suns JTable implementation.

Editing is triggered whenever a mouse is clicked inside a Figure in a Diagram. The FigureEditor for the diagram is obtained and an Component is produced to perform the editing. Editing will continue until that Component loses focus, either from clicking off or clicking onto another Figure.

Three Action objects are installed in the Diagram ActionMap,

"startEditing" "stopEditing" "cancleEditing"

A diagram can insert mapping for these actions into its InputMap inorder to take advantage of them. Editing can be controlled programtically, on the selected Figure, in this way.
